properties.question: What is NOT a common cause of syncope (fainting) or lipothymia (transient loss of consciousness) in adults?
properties.option_a: Reflex syncope due to sudden standing up
properties.option_d: Transient ischemic attack (TIA) due to cerebral blood flow
